items.title: Basic Content Creation and Editing
items.description: Enable users to create, edit, and delete content pages within the CMS, accessible only after authentication via Auth0.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in via Auth0 before accessing content creation features
User can create a new content page with title and body text
User can edit existing content and save changes
Changes are reflected immediately in the CMS interface
dependencies: User authentication module with Auth0 integration
non_functional: System should respond to content save actions within 2 seconds
Support for at least 50 concurrent editing sessions
Auth0 authentication process should complete within 3 seconds under normal load

notes: Requirement updated to specify Auth0 as the authentication provider. Assumed that Auth0 integration will handle user login and session management before allowing content CRUD operations.
